Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 8th overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1988...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1992, off David West (CAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/1992, off Mike Mussina (CAL)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1992, hitting .519 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Was selected to the 1993 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Texas on 4/5/1994...
Drove in 6 runs against Baltimore on 10/1/1994...
Was selected to the 1998 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1998...
